price: And among those whom We created is a group[82] that guides others with the truth and establishes justice therewith.
arabic: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
